name: Amit Polymers
overview:
Established in the year 1980 at New Delhi (India), we, “Amit Polymers,” are a famous name engaged in manufacturing, supplying and exporting a broad assortment of Footwear like Kids Shoes, School Shoes.

Our Product Range: Gents Shoes Ladies Shoes Kids Sandals Ladies Slippers Ladies Sandal Ladies Chappals Mens Sandals Eva Collections

Our Quality Assurance: Quality uniformity is always our important point that enables us offer supreme quality products to the clients. Our quality personnel employ stringent quality control policies, right from procuring of raw material till the dispatch of clients’ orders.

Why Us ?: There are many causes that make us the highly preferred choice of clients in this domain. The reasons creditable to our magnificent success are as follow: State-of-the-art infrastructure Team of experts

Client Satisfaction: Providing optimum satisfaction to the client is the chief aim of our organization for which we persistently strive hard.

Our Infrastructure: We own a high-tech infrastructural facility that is armed with an adequate production unit, quality inspection wing, research and development department and a spacious warehousing and packaging facility.
